name: 陳煒朋　Office Hours
objective:
本課程之目標在於如何應用計量方法來進行財金議題之研究，課程內容包括縱斷面資料分析、橫斷面資料分析、追蹤資料分析、以及多變量時間序列分析等，讓學生掌握有助於分析經濟和金融數據的計量經濟學學習方法的知識，培養同學具有應用計量軟體進行分析研究的能力。
The course is aimed to provide essential econometric methods and their application to research issues. Topics cover regression analysis using time-series data, cross-sectional data, and panel data. The multivariate time-series analysis is also introduced in the course. This course is designed to prepare students with knowledge of econometric methods that are useful for analyzing economic and financial data. Students will focus on learning econometric software skills in estimating and analyzing econometric models.
